name: Maple Leaf Foods Inc.
description: Maple Leaf Foods Inc. is a leading Canadian consumer packaged meats company, dedicated to providing high-quality, sustainable food products. Founded in 1927, the company has evolved significantly over the decades, becoming a key player in the North American food industry. Maple Leaf Foods is committed to sustainability and animal welfare, with a focus on innovative practices that reduce its environmental footprint. The company produces a wide range of products, including fresh and prepared meats, deli meats, and plant-based protein products under brands like Maple Leaf, Schneider's, and Lightlife. With a strong emphasis on food safety and quality, Maple Leaf Foods continually invests in advanced technologies and processes to ensure the highest standards in its manufacturing facilities. The company's mission is to provide nutritious and delicious food options while maintaining a commitment to responsible sourcing and community engagement. Maple Leaf Foods is also making strides in reducing greenhouse gas emissions and improving the overall sustainability of its supply chain, aligning with its vision of being a leader in the food industry.

seo.meta_title: Maple Leaf Foods Inc. | Sustainable Food Products
seo.meta_description: Discover Maple Leaf Foods Inc., a leader in sustainable food production. Explore our range of high-quality meat and plant-based products.

faq.question: What does Maple Leaf Foods produce?
faq.answer: Maple Leaf Foods produces a variety of meat and plant-based products, including fresh meats and deli items.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Maple Leaf Foods?
faq.answer: Michael McCain is the CEO of Maple Leaf Foods Inc.

faq.question: Where is Maple Leaf Foods headquartered?
faq.answer: Maple Leaf Foods is headquartered in Toronto, Ontario, Canada.

faq.question: When was Maple Leaf Foods founded?
faq.answer: Maple Leaf Foods was founded in 1927.
